resources.string: Welcome! Please provide your name (used for sender identification):
Invalid tag name. Tag names are not empty, unique (also among group names), case-insensitive and contain only letters, numbers and underscores.
Invalid tag group name. Tag names are not empty, unique (also among tag names), case-insensitive and contain only letters, numbers and underscores.
A tag group cannot be removed while working on it. Move to another group and try again.
An unexpected error occurred that prevented the group from being deleted.
Directory attachments are not supported yet
Attachment already exists. Attachment names are unique and case-insensitive.
Specify at least one tag to send the message to
The message could not be sent (are you still in the intranet?)
That tag has already been specified. Duplicating tags on send is meaningless.
This device is lacking a registration id. Try again later.
This device does not support Google Play Services. The app will misbehave.
No valid Google Play Services APK found. Install Google Play Services or the app will misbehave.
An error occurred when trying to attach %s
